type.description: Triggers release when a new commit is made to a Git repository

property.name: username
property.description: Custom username to override global server configuration

property.name: password
property.description: Custom password to override global server configuration

property.name: branchRegex
property.description: Only trigger if commit branch matches this regex.

property.name: fileRegex
property.description: Only trigger if commit file(s) match this regex. Only a single file of the change set needs to match this regex to trigger.

property.name: triggerOnInitialPublish
property.description: Should suppress error when artifact not found for the given GAV coordinates. Set this to true when artifact was never published to Git and you want to trigger a release on the initial publish. Default value is 'false'

type.description: Create a release based on a commit id (SHA).

property.name: username
property.description: Custom username to override global server configuration

property.name: password
property.description: Custom password to override global server configuration

property.name: tagName
property.description: Tag name. Normally 'V' plus version number.

type.description: Create a pull request from a branch to master.

property.name: username
property.description: Custom username to override global server configuration

property.name: password
property.description: Custom password to override global server configuration

property.name: branch
property.description: Name of the branch where changes are implemented.

property.name: base
property.description: The name of the branch you want the changes pulled into.

property.name: body
property.description: The contents of the pull request.
